summary: The article introduces an AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics feature for MkDocs documentation and blogs. It integrates multiple AI services, supports multilingual summaries, smart content cleaning, and flexible configuration. The tool provides accurate character statistics, code detection, estimated reading time, and adaptive environment recognition. Installation methods, AI service setup, parameter configuration, local testing, deployment options, and usage guidelines are detailed. Cost estimates, advanced configurations, and customization options are also discussed. The tool offers efficient AI summary control at both page and folder levels.
